description: This prawn summer roll bowl has all the flavours of the takeaway favourite without the rice paper wrapper.
name: Prawn Summer Roll Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large cucumber, sliced into ribbons with a vegetable peeler
2 medium carrots, sliced into ribbons with a vegetable peeler

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice noodles according to pack instructions, drain and set aside in a large mixing bowl.
Whisk the garlic and chilli paste, maple syrup, sesame oil, soy sauce and rice wine vinegar together in a small bowl.
Add the cucumber and carrot ribbons, shredded cabbage, chopped herbs, spring onions and prawns to the bowl.
Pour the dressing over and toss to coat everything well. Serve in bowls with more fresh herbs on top.
